text: The Tara () is a river in Novosibirsk and Omsk Oblasts in Russia. It is a right tributary of the Irtysh in the Ob's basin. The length of the river is . The area of its basin . The Tara freezes up in late October or November and stays under the ice until late April or early May. ==See also== *List of rivers in Russia ==References== Category:Rivers of Novosibirsk Oblast Category:Rivers of Omsk Oblast
title: Tara (Irtysh)
